GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync), Word, Excel, Power Point, PDF

Multimedia.Sound Enhancement: Dual Speaker (0.7 W Multi Channel Speaker, 1.4 W High Powered Boost Amp), EQ Filter and Sound Normalizer, Pre-set Equalizer, Dual Microphone
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports H.263, WMV, MP4, DivX, H.264, HD

Camera.Other Camera Features: BSI Sensor, Cheese Shutter, Auto Focus, Innovative UX Features, Super Resolution Zoom, Face Tracking, Panorama, Continuous Shot, Beauty Shot, Geo-tagging, ISO: Auto, 400, 200, 100, Image Share, Image Editor

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v3, Supported Profiles (HID, FTP, SPP, AVRCP, GAP, OPP, A2DP, HFP, HSP, PBAP)

Other Features.Important Apps: Gmail, AOL, Yahoo, Hotmail, LG Email, Instant Messaging, Google Talk, Messenger, LG Software, Hungama Music, Google Account, Google +, Bookmarks, Google Play Store, Facebook, Hangouts, Twitter, Weather, YouTube
Other Features.SAR Value: At the Ear - 0.435 W/Kg, At the Body - 1.30 W/Kg
Other Features.Sensors: Ambient Light Sensor, Accelerometer, Proximity Sensor, Digital Compass

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: Brightness, IPS Display, Auto-rotate Screen, Narrow Bezel Display, Pinch-to-Zoom, sRGB 100 %, Vivid Full HD Display, Multi-touch
